page.title: 12RECRETION:WOKINGHAM WITHOUT
page.content: In Wokingham Without, residents enjoy a variety of activities.At home {television,video recorders}and {gardening}are popular pastimes. Outside the home{jogging,walking,golf, {badminton,squash and visiting pubs}are popular. There are four busy pubs all offering meals at lunchtime, alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Bitter beer at 72p.a pint and lager at 88p. are the most popular drinks. Within the area is a{horse riding establishment including an indoor school. The cost of hacking in the nearby woods or an indoor group lesson is Â£6.50 per head. There are 25 horses each worth about Â£800. There are two{golf courses adjoining the region.{Cricket,football and{archery}are practised in the playing field next to St. Sebastian's school.
